ygData.subject: RE: RE: Finally 200
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe funny, you say It is a fact - ok, whatever, I am not going to get into a flame war about this, but would be interested to know where you get this Fact
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe funny, you say "It is a fact" - ok, whatever, I am not going to get
into a flame war about this, but would be interested to know where you get
this "Fact" from..... I was merely offering some advice that might help you
see something from a different angle. I had a "Wis" suit and was able to
get my Wisdom up to 98 with it, and had about a 50 percent failure rate on
Darkwoods (this is all at my current skill level of 196 since it has not
gone up in 4 months). I ditched my Wis gear to make room for Warrior gear I
was starting to acquire. At that point my failure rated started to drop....
Now another thing that has gone up, other than my dexterity is my level, it
might even be possible that has something to do with it as well.

Vapn, Master Fletcher, Povar


-----Original Message-----
From: Cooper, Mark [mailto:blackhawk@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 2:27 PM
To: EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Fletchers] RE: Finally 200


From: blackhawk@... (Cooper, Mark)

HEHE.. ok i don't mind ifyou want to dissagree... but wis is direclty tied
to rate of success... and 33% fail of darkwood sends a cool shiver down my
spine... i hope i get that rich that 33% fail on dark wood is no big deal..
and there is no ned to argue about wis it is a fact.. but if you liketo go
with out .. no problem... i do not fight with my wis stuff on but i do
fletch with it.. i want my failures to be no more that 5% at max 10%.. so i
go looking for more wis items )

good fletching to you

karvar blackhawk
grand master fletcher lvl 200
----- Original Message -----
From: Murr Rockstroh <mrockstr@...>
To: <EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 3:05 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Fletchers] RE: Finally 200


> From: "Murr Rockstroh" <mrockstr@...>
>
> I am going to have to disagree here about the Wisdom thing and
failures.....
> This is something that I first heard in Beta.... My wisdom is 74, and my
> Dex is 117, and I don't fail much on Darkwoods (about 33 percent). I
think
> that different skills might take different attributes for success.... My
Int
> is 102 anyways (no suit needed, I am a gnome)
>
> Vapn Maistre, Master Fletcher, Povar
> Level 33 Warrior
>
